# calculationMode

**Instance Property**

The interpolation formula for blending between target geometries.

## Declaration

```swift
var calculationMode: SCNMorpherCalculationMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNMorpherCalculationMode/normalized]. See [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNMorpherCalculationMode] for allowed values.
title: calculationMode
